patterns: would you like your order shipped to your home address or work address
would you like to receive a confirmation email or text message
would you like to add this product to your wishlist
responses: Would you like to add this product to your wishlist?
You can add this product to your wishlist by clicking the 'Add to Wishlist' button.

patterns: would you like to subscribe to our newsletter
responses: Would you like to subscribe to our newsletter?
You can subscribe to our newsletter by clicking the 'Subscribe to Newsletter' button.

patterns: how can we improve our customer service
responses: We're always looking for ways to improve our customer service.
What can we do to make your experience better?
Thank you for your feedback. We'll take it into account when we're making improvements to our customer service.

patterns: what else can i help you with today
do you have any other questions
responses: Is there anything else that I can help you with today?
Thank you for your time. Is there anything else that I can help you with?
I'm happy to help you with anything else that you need.
